Text: New AirTran Airways Grade A SaleWe are pleased to announce a new sale that puts every city in our system on sale for travel all the way through September Discounts range up to off the already low fares we offer everyday This sale requires a day advance purchase and is valid for travel everyday of the week Seats are limited and may be unavailable on some days and flights that operate during peak and holiday travel times such as the Easter Memorial Day July th and Labor Day holiday periods Travel on sale fares to and from Fort Lauderdale Fort Myers Miami Orlando and Tampa is valid everyday of the week on or after April Travel before April in the above Florida cities is valid southbound Sunday through Wednesday and northbound Tuesday through Friday You must purchase sale tickets by March Receive a BONUS eachway discount if you make your sale fare booking online at Remember Travel may originate in either city and all fares are one way and dont require a roundtrip purchase and restrictions All fares are oneway All fares are nonrefundable and a per person fee applies to any change made after purchase plus any applicable increase in airfare Travel on sale fares must be purchased no later than March All travel must be completed by September Travel on sale fares to and from Fort Lauderdale Fort Myers Miami Orlando and Tampa is valid everyday of the week after April Travel before April in the above Florida cities is valid southbound Sunday through Wednesday and northbound Tuesday through Friday Fares have a day advance purchase restriction and may be combined with regular fares to complete an itinerary Travel on sale fares is not valid on March through April or on April or on May or on June or on July or on August or on September Travel also may not be available to and from select cities during other periods of high passenger demand Service tofrom Rochester NY begins on March Seats are limited and subject to availability Fares dont include segment taxes of for each segment A segment is defined as a takeoff and landing The September th security fee of up to is not included Airport passenger facility charges of up to are not included Fares tofrom Grand Bahama Island do not include in roundtrip taxes As a subscriber to AirTran Airways Net Escapes we send you regular updates on our Internet specials If you need to contact us for any other reason please call us at AIRTRAN or in Atlanta call Please note that any reference to Net Escapes fares Feature City fares or bonus discounts for booking online may ONLY be purchased on our web site To unsubscribe please click UMUaspB and you will be removed immediately Or To unsubscribe mailto or if the emailaddress is not clickable simply copy the text to the right of the mailto command and paste it into your email application and hit send You will be taken off the list immediately Thank you
